synopsis.text:
Focuses on Haru, Makoto, Nagisa, and Rei, the first installment of the Timeless Medley duology chronicles the establishment of the Iwatobi Swim Club. As Haru and his rival, Rin, strive for bright futures in swimming, they face challenges head-on, supported by their friends.

Reunited with Rin, Haruka Nanase and his fellow Iwatobi Swim Club members - Makoto Tachibana, Rei Ryuugazaki, and Nagisa Hazuki - gear up for upcoming tournaments, aiming to triumph as a team. Meanwhile, Rin trains at Samezuka Academy, equally determined to excel.

With graduation looming for the seniors and Rin having decided on his future, Haruka and Makoto grapple with the pressure of choosing their own paths. This movie primarily recaps events from Eternal Summer and season one, with a focus on Haru and the Iwatobi Swim Club. It also features never-before-seen scenes and cameos from High Speed characters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
